---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest new content or improvements
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of what you'd like to see added or improved.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a problem?

Example: "I'm always frustrated when I can't find information about..."

## Proposed Solution
Describe the content or feature you'd like to see added.

### Examples:
- New documentation section
- Additional examples
- Better explanations
- Visual diagrams
- Practice exercises
- External resources
- Tool recommendations

## Content Outline (if proposing new docs)
If you're suggesting a new documentation section, outline what it should cover:

1. Topic 1
2. Topic 2
3. Topic 3

## Target Audience
Who would benefit from this feature?
- [ ] Beginners
- [ ] Intermediate users
- [ ] Advanced users
- [ ] All levels

## Alternatives Considered
Are there alternative approaches or workarounds currently available?

## Willingness to Contribute
- [ ] I'd like to work on this myself
- [ ] I can help review/test
- [ ] I'm just suggesting the idea

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, links, or examples about the feature request here.

## Related Issues
Link any related issues or discussions.
